title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5201.7 - Variances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5201.7 - Variances

State Regulations
(a) The board shall
have authority to grant variances from the strict provisions of this Part, upon
application therefor and upon a showing of: (1)
unnecessary hardship; and
(2)
that an alternative measure or method to
be adopted will meet the objectives of the standards. (b) In granting such variance, the board
shall provide that such variance shall be for a stated period of
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5201.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
